content.html: I'm terrified of #LongCovid despite having 3 jabs. This means that I will have no confidence to leave the house. Vulnerable and immunocompromised don't have a choice here. I've been so anxious over this for the past week that it derailed my focus. bbc.co.uk/news/uk-604469…
content.value:
I'm terrified of #LongCovid despite having 3 jabs. This means that I will have no confidence to leave the house. Vulnerable and immunocompromised don't have a choice here. 

I've been so anxious over this for the past week that it derailed my focus. 

bbc.co.uk/news/uk-604469…
